alert.note: Alert for Sabine (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 12:22AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Sabine Parish, east central San Augustine and central Sabine Counties through 100 AM CDT... At 1222 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Many to 6 miles northwest of Milam to near Rosevine. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Milam, Many, Hemphill, Rosevine, Florien, Fisher, Bronson, Negreet, Mount Carmel and Chinaquapin. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CDT for eastern Texas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for northwestern Louisiana...and eastern Texas.
